        public Investment​(java.lang.String symbol,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  int quantity,
                  double price,
                  double value,
                  java.lang.String investmentType)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        This constructor is used for search
        Parameters:
        symbol - String, it should be a unique symbol to identify the Investment
        name - String, name of the Investment
        quantity - int, the quantity of the Investment
        price - double, the price of the Investment
        value - double, the total cost of the Investment
        investmentType - String, the type of Investment(stock or mutual fund)

        java.lang.Exception - ,to do Exceptions using try catch
